Wondrous item, legendary (requires attunement)
This fragmentary black book contains puzzling guidelines for frightful necromantic rituals and maddening interdimensional travel.
The book holds the following spells: @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPsemblanceofdre]{semblance of dread}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPectoplasm00000]{ectoplasm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.oyE5nVppa5mde5gT]{animate dead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.I2LUSF5ogc7Bj62e]{speak with dead}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPemanationofyot]{emanation of Yoth}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPgreendecay0000]{green decay}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPyellowsign0000]{yellow sign}, @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPeldritchcommun]{eldritch communion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.E4NXux0RHvME1XgP]{create undead}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XbwGq5kDJNvAxNXV]{gate}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.tMH6Ivn4GmE1naMj]{harm}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TIoadMIsUKD4edXi]{astral projection}, and @UUID[Compendium.koboldpressogl.koboldpressspells.Item.KPvoidrift000000]{Void rift}.
If you are attuned to this book, you can use it as a spellbook and as an arcane focus. In addition, while holding the book, you can use a bonus action to cast a necromancy spell that is written in this tome without expending a spell slot or using any verbal or somatic components. Once used, this property of the book canâ€™t be used again until the next dawn.
